page.title: 07BERRY POMEROY CASTLE
page.content: We went to Berry Pomeroy Castle which was the home of the Pomeroy family and then later the residence of the Seymours. Workmen were rebuilding some of the castle walls and we were shown a medieval fresco which had been discovered on the wall of the chapel above the gate house. It is called 'The adoration of the Magi.' It is thought to have been painted by a Flemish artist during the fourteenth century. We saw the Round Tower in which Lady Margaret was imprisoned in the dungeons for ten years. She died there and her ghost is said to haunt the ramparts.
